Name: Ovation Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Togepi, Togetic, and Togekiss.  Swap a Togek-Wing and a Togek-Card for an Ovation Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
